translations: v．误导，使走错路：引导某人走向错误的方向或给予错误的信息。

sentences.sentence: Birthed out of shame, fear, and denial; it misdirects our good intentions and drives us to unthinkable ACTS of self-destruction and not-so-unbelievable ACTS of self-sabotage.
sentences.translation: 产生出于羞愧、恐惧和否认的它将我们的好意误导并驱使我们做出不可想象的自我毁灭行为以及不那么令人难以置信的自我破坏行为。
